pageProduct.name: Pearl Drops Everyday Extra White Fresh Mint Toothpaste 110g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Pearl Drops Extra White Everyday Whitening Toothpaste helps whiten teeth without the use of harsh abrasives, bleaches or acidic pH. The specially developed 4 part cleaning system contains 3 stain fighters and 1 cleanser to gently and safely stains and surface discolouration caused by tea, coffee, food and other stains. The anti-cavity fluoride formulation helps remove plaque, strengthen tooth enamel and protect against tooth decay and fight tartar.

• Everyday whitening toothpaste for healthy teeth and gums.
• Gently removes surface stains and discolouration.
• Helps whiten teeth without the use of harsh abrasives, bleaches.
• Its Freshmint flavour provides longer lasting fresh breath

Warnings

Do not use in children 6 years of age or less.

Common Uses

Helps whiten teeth for healthy teeth and gums.

Ingredients

ACTIVE: Sodium Monofluorophosphate
OTHER INGREDIENTS: Water, Hydrated Silica, Calcium Pyrophosphate, Sorbitol, Glycerin, Dicalcium Phosphate, Peg-12, Sodium Lauryl Sulphate, Flavour, Titanium Dioxide, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Saccharin, Trisodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate. Contains No Sugar.

Directions

With daily use you should notice a difference in just a few weeks. For best results brush teeth at least twice a day, floss regularly and see your dentist twice a year or as recommended.

Use in place of your regular toothpaste

Do not use in children 6 years of age or less.
